ยง 6801. Controlled substances forfeiture (Repealed).

2017 Repeal.

Section 6801 was repealed June 29, 2017, P.L.247, No.13, effective July 1, 2017.

ยง 6801.1. Terrorism forfeiture (Repealed).

2017 Repeal.

Section 6801.1 was repealed June 29, 2017, P.L.247, No.13, effective July 1, 2017.

ยง 6802. Procedure with respect to seized property subject to liens and rights of lienholders (Repealed).

Section 6802 was repealed June 29, 2017, P.L.247, No.13, effective July 1, 2017.
